text.text: Historical exploration on the property encountered numerous encouraging showings of nickel, copper and cobalt.

However, the property was sparsely explored, with up to 800m drill hole spacing or more, and the deepest hole investigated at merely a 100m vertical depth, leaving a lot of ground to investigate more thoroughly.
Pictured here is Claude Duplessis P. Eng. of Gold Minds Geoservices overseeing drilling at Graal.
